name: get_all_motivational_quotes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool motivational_content.
Tool description: Get motivational quotes and motivational pictures.
API description: This endpoint fetches all the motivational quotes. However, you can do pagination as well using the 'skip' and 'limit' parameters.

skip.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

limit.description: The number of quotes to return.
